name: Predictes
tagline: Software Agency focused on Kentico and Microsoft
description:
Software Agency from Poland focused on Kentico EMS and Microsoft Azure cloud technologies.
We design, implement and support eCommerce systems with Customer Experience Management features.
We are part of APN Promise S.A. a listed group of technology companies.
We are enthusiasts of digital experience built around Kentico. Creation of buying journey mixed with technology is what makes our blood runs faster. 
Since 2006 we are leading, certified Kentico Gold Partner with experience that let us win Kentico awards. We're also an outsourcing provider on a software development field. We have excellent references from Poland and United States where we work for Kentico Partners.
This year we won the award in Kentico ”Site of the year 2014” contest in “Best Kentico EMS implementation” category.
